BodyName: Committee on Mental Health, Developmental Disability, Alcoholism, Substance Abuse and Disability Services

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to drug strategy.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law amend the New York city charter, in relation to requiring the installation of induction loops systems for certain capital projects paid in whole or in part from the city treasury and requiring the publication of public locations where such systems are available.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring that all public meetings be held in facilities equipped with assistive listening systems.
